alert.note: Alert for Upper Tanana Valley and the Fortymile Country (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 20 at 7:35PM AKST until December 21 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow occuring, and blowing snow with low visibility expected. Snow accumulation 4 to 6 inches. Blowing snow will cause visibility to fall to one half mile or less at times. * WHERE...Along the Alaska Highway. * WHEN...Until noon Tuesday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will continue through Tuesday morning, with 4 to 6 inches accumulation. Northwest winds gusting to 30 mph will develop early Tuesday morning causing low visibility on blowing snow, along with drifting snow. The winds and blowing snow will taper off Tuesday afternoon, and conditions will improve then. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will cause travel difficulties. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Upper Tanana Valley and the Fortymile Country
